title: In-game Freeze [Not Fixed]
body:
As the title states, I am having a problem exactly like this. The problem occurs every single game and puts me behind early game, rendering me at an unfair disadvantage. 

Please watch the video and hopefully we can find a fix.
Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) for me, let me know if this helps.

I do believe that either the server for this link is down, or the link itself is broken. 
It will not open.

*EDIT*

I have run a Clean Boot, so far so good.

Hey there,

Glad to hear the clean boot resolved your issue.

Are you still unable to access the provided link? I would recommend switching to a public DNS to resolve the issue, as the support site is definitely up.

* Hit the Windows Key
* Type "Control Panel"
* Select "Network and Internet"
* Select "Network and Sharing Center"
* Select "Change Adapter Settings" on the navigation bar on the left
* Right click on your network adapter and select "Properties"
* Select "Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)" and open "Properties"
* Go to the bottom of the menu and change "Obtain DNS server address automatically," to "Use the following DNS server addresses:"
* Put in the following public DNS servers, one in each empty field:

> * 8.8.8.8 
> * 8.8.4.4

* Save your changes by selecting "Ok"
* Close all open web browsers and applications
* Hit the Windows Key
* Right click anywhere
* Click on "All Apps"
* Right click "Command Prompt" and run as administrator
* Type ipconfig /flushdns and press Enter.
* Restart your computer
